description:
As you may know, bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency that gains more and more attraction. Further information about the bitcoin-project you can find online, for example at Wikipedia.

There are many reasons why you could be interested in the latest bitcoin market prices. This application extends your wallpaper with bitcoin exchange rates, so you can easily keep track of the current market value of a bitcoin.

Wallpaper Extension (Bitcoin) is very intuitive and simple to use. You can set a refresh interval and/or an automatic refresh at midnight. The refresh process requires a internet connection to download the exchange rate information. Supported currencies are USD, EUR, JPY, CNY, SGD, HKD, CAD, AUD, NZD, GBP, DKK, SEK, BRL, CHF, RUB, SLL, PLN and THB.

You can download Wallpaper Extension (Bitcoin) right now for the low cost of almost nothing. Tamoggemon provides you an seven days a week application support via email.
